statements: SELECT * FROM product_information;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_information WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, product_description, category FROM product_information ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM product_information WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, stock_quantity FROM product_information WHERE category IN ('Clothing','Accessories') ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_information WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_information WHERE stock_quantity < 50
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM product_information WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT category, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM product_information GROUP BY category
SELECT * FROM product_information WHERE product_description LIKE '%premium%'
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT recommended_product_id, recommendation_rank FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_rank ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE category IN ('Clothing', 'Accessories') ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM recommendations JOIN products ON recommendations.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY recommendation_rank ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY category, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY category, product_name DESC
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT product_id, recommendation_text FROM recommendations
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC, price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' OR category = 'Clothing' AND price < 100 ORDER BY category, price DESC;

SELECT users.username, products.product_name, recommendations.recommendation_text FROM users JOIN recommendations ON users.user_id = recommendations.user_id JOIN products ON recommendations.product_id = products.product_id WHERE users.username <> 'admin' ORDER BY recommendations.recommendation_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM product_info;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM product_info ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_info WHERE customer_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_name, product_description, product_price FROM product_info WHERE product_price < 50;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customer_info WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM product_info WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM product_info WHERE product_price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_info ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT conversation_id, customer_id, timestamp FROM chatbot_conversations WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, recommendation_text FROM product_info JOIN marketing_recommendations ON product_info.product_id = marketing_recommendations.product_id WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM products LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity > 1 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, recommended_product_id FROM recommendations WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, price, description FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT p.name, o.quantity, o.order_date FROM products p INNER JOIN orders o ON p.id = o.product_id;
SELECT u.username, p.name, o.quantity FROM users u INNER JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id INNER JOIN products p ON p.id = o.product_id;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, rp.name AS recommended_product_name FROM products p INNER JOIN recommendations r ON p.id = r.product_id INNER JOIN products rp ON r.recommended_product_id = rp.id;
